Flow.description: - Adding check for non-practicing pharmacist and Pharmacy Technician -Filter by only pharmacy and technician registrations (students, interns, and candidates cant do CEUs) New Screen & get Records for Registration Object only related to same registrant - to empty collection for another ceu creation. Split collection records by semi-colon. -- Added new Accredited body Mainpro+

value.stringValue: 1.1 Assess the patient’s needs, concerns and health status
1.3 Support the patient to implement the care plan
1.4 Monitor the patient’s progress with the care plan
2.4 Maintain records of preparation and distribution
2.6 Dispose of drug preparations and products
3.1 Ensure the confidentiality of all forms of patient information
3.3 Ensure the safety and security of records
4.1 Educate to support and promote health
4.2 Contribute to the education and training of learners, i.e., pharmacy students, interns, residents and technicians
5.2 Oversee the human resources within the practice
5.3 Oversee the pharmacy’s operational systems and processes
6.1 Plan and implement professional development strategies to maintain professional competence
7.2 Advocate and support policies that promote improved health outcomes, public safety and the viability of the healthcare system
7.3 Develop, maintain and promote collaborative relationships with health care providers and others

Flow.label: SF - Button - Create CEUs

recordLookups.label: Get CEUs That Are Not Linked To A Renewal Yet

fields.name: CEUDisclaimer
fields.fieldText: CEUs completed in September, October, November and December can either be applied to the current renewal year or the following renewal year. They cannot be used twice and the number of units assigned for an individual CEU cannot be split up between two renewal years.

fields.name: When_Did_You_Complete_Your_CEU
fields.fieldText: When Did You Complete Your CEU?

fields.name: MoreThan15CEUsOutstanding
fields.fieldText: Once completed, you will have more than 15 CEUs recorded for the upcoming renewal year. Please ensure you are applying these to the correct year
